content: might choose aggregated Advanced Workload License Charges (AWLC) pricing or aggregated Parallel Sysplex License Charges (PSLC) pricing (subject to all applicable terms and conditions). When an IBM z16 A02 or IBM z16 AGZ is part of a Multiplex under Country Multiplex Pricing (CMP) terms, Country Multiplex License Charges (CMLC), Multiplex zNALC (MzNALC), and Flat Workload License Charges (FWLC) are the only pricing metrics available (subject to all applicable terms and conditions). When an IBM z16 A02 or IBM z16 AGZ is running 21st Century Software VSEn, you can choose 21CS MLC Full Capacity or MLC Sub-capacity, which are subject to all applicable 21CS VSEn terms and conditions. For more information visit 21cs.com. For more information about AWLC, CMLC, MzNALC, PSLC, MWLC, or the Technology Update Pricing and Transition Charges for Sysplexes or Multiplexes TTO offerings, see the IBM Z Software Pricing page of the IBM IT infrastructure website. 7.9 References For more information about
